name: Toilet Paperboy
description:
Use Arrows or A/D keys to avoid obstacles and Space to break windows.

This is my submission for the Major Jam: Isolation. The theme was "Isolation" with a special limitation of "There are no living things". Animated non-living things were allowed so naturally, I decided to use a zombie and try my hand at a classic, Paperboy. I learned a lot coding-wise for this project and integrated random generation for the street objects, obstacles and houses. I didn't get this one developed nearly as much as as I wanted to but it was a great learning experience and I hope you enjoy it!

Houses - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/p/building-kit-1-68179
